name: One Day to Disappear
description:
Shinichi is a boy in the last year of high school. One day he climbs onto his school's rooftop, his goal is clear: to jump, falling down.
After all it is easy: his school has a roof without anti-suicide barrier...
But he wait...time goes by ...he's afraid. It is not easy to do it.
At that point, a mysterious voice appears.Is it his courage? Is it the devil?From that moment on, Shinichi feels death approaching.

Rilasciata Beta-Demo del progetto in lingua ITALIANA.

Presto sarà disponibile la versione in inglese.
